abstract: With an average of 12.9 million viewers on Tuesday, NBC’s “America’s Got Talent” lifted the network to No. 1 in the ratings for the night, according to Nielsen’s estimates. The 9 p.m. reality show earned the night’s largest audience, enough to compensate for NBC’s less impressive ratings the rest of the night.
lead_paragraph: With an average of 12.9 million viewers on Tuesday, NBC’s “America’s Got Talent” lifted the network to No. 1 in the ratings for the night, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
